title: New & MPfree: Ne-Yo & jj – We Can't Stop
body: In possibly the most perfectly matched collaboration of the year, American R&B star **Ne-Yo** has teamed up with Swedish pop duo **jj** to produce an exclusive track for the [Adult Swim](http://www.adultswim.com/promos/201106_kiasingles/index.html) series. _We Can’t Stop_ was recorded by Ne-Yo before being sent over to **Elin Kastlander** and **Joakim Benon**, in order for them to add their own creative touch. The dream pop of **jj** works fantastically well when pitted against the slick, soulful sound of **Ne-Yo**, bringing about the shimmering, heartfelt _We Can’t Stop_. When **Ne-Yo** enters midway through the track, their are risks of it morphing into into a glorified remix, however the continued inclusion of **jj** samples and choruses instead turn it into an epic R&B number. Stream and download the track below.
